body: At 11th level, as long as the techslinger has at least 1 grit point, she can treat a heavy weapon as a firearm for the purpose of using deeds.
name: Heavy Weaponry Deeds
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Archtypes/Technology-Themed Archetypes/Techslinger/Deeds/Heavy Weaponry Deeds
